statements: SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE ticket_price > 50.00
SELECT concert_id, concert_name FROM ConcertSchedule ORDER BY concert_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 30.00 AND 80.00
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE ticket_price > 100.00 ORDER BY concert_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01' AND concert_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM ConcertSchedule WHERE concert_name LIKE '%Live%'
SELECT * FROM ConcertSchedule ORDER BY ticket_price DESC, concert_date ASC
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS highest_ticket_price FROM ConcertSchedule
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, date_time FROM Concerts;
SELECT * FROM Tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, price, seat_number FROM Tickets;
SELECT concert_id, concert_name, venue_name, date_time FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, date_time FROM Concerts WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Concerts WHERE date_time > '2022-10-01' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT concert_name, price, seat_number FROM Concerts c INNER JOIN Tickets t ON c.concert_id = t.concert_id WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT venue_name FROM Concerts ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT concert_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Concerts c INNER JOIN Tickets t ON c.concert_id = t.concert_id GROUP BY concert_name HAVING AVG(price) > 100;
SELECT * FROM concert_schedule WHERE artist_name = 'Coldplay';
SELECT venue_name, event_date FROM concert_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, event_date FROM concert_schedule WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM concert_schedule;
SELECT artist_name, venue_name, event_date FROM concert_schedule WHERE venue_name = 'Madison Square Garden';
SELECT * FROM concert_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC, artist_name ASC
SELECT artist_name, venue_name FROM concert_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY artist_name, venue_name
SELECT MAX(total_tickets_sold) AS max_tickets_sold, venue_name FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY venue_name ORDER BY max_tickets_sold DESC
SELECT artist_name, total_revenue FROM concert_schedule JOIN event_management ON concert_schedule.concert_id = event_management.concert_id WHERE total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY artist_name
SELECT event_manager, AVG(total_revenue) AS avg_revenue FROM event_management GROUP BY event_manager HAVING avg_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY avg_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, artist_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE concert_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT concert_id, artist_name FROM Concerts WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM Venues ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, price, availability FROM Tickets WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT concert_name, artist_name, concert_date FROM Concerts;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM Venues ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, price, availability FROM Tickets WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sales_id, sale_date, buyer_name, total_amount FROM TicketSales WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;

SELECT Concerts.concert_name, Venues.venue_name, Tickets.price, Tickets.availability FROM Concerts JOIN Tickets ON Concerts.concert_id = Tickets.concert_id JOIN Venues ON Tickets.venue_id = Venues.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM concert_schedule ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT concert_name, venue FROM concert_schedule WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM venues WHERE venue_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_name ASC, attendee_email DESC;
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM event_managers WHERE venue_id IN (SELECT venue_id FROM venues WHERE venue_location = 'New York');
SELECT * FROM concert_schedule WHERE venue = 'Venue A' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT concert_name, date_time, venue FROM concert_schedule WHERE concert_name LIKE '%Rock%' AND date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC;

SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email, venue_name FROM attendees JOIN ticket_sales ON attendees.ticket_id = ticket_sales.ticket_id JOIN concert_schedule ON ticket_sales.concert_id = concert_schedule.concert_id JOIN venues ON concert_schedule.venue = venues.venue_name WHERE venue_location = 'City X';
SELECT manager_name, manager_email, venue_name FROM event_managers JOIN venues ON event_managers.venue_id = venues.venue_id WHERE venue_location = 'City Y';

SELECT DISTINCT concert_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM concert_schedule JOIN ticket_sales ON concert_schedule.concert_id = ticket_sales.concert_id GROUP BY concert_name HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 50;
